|vo_01_01_title_s    = 初次见面…
|vo_01_01_title_t    = 初次見面…
|vo_01_01_subtitle   = Hello
|vo_01_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Hello.ogg
|vo_01_01_tx_s       = 「飘摇风雨中，带刀归来赤脚行」…我的名字是枫原万叶，游历四方的浪人。既然你我都在旅行的路上，这段路不妨结伴同行。
|vo_01_01_tx_t       = 「飄搖風雨中，帶刀歸來赤腳行」…我的名字是楓原萬葉，遊歷四方的浪人。既然(你/妳)我都在旅行的路上，這段路不妨結伴同行。
|vo_01_01_rm         = "Piāoyáo fēngyǔ zhōng, dài dāo guīlái chìjiǎo xíng"... Wǒ de míngzi shì Fēngyuán Wànyè, yóulì sìfāng de làngrén. Jìrán nǐ wǒ dōu zài lǚxíng de lùshàng, zhè duàn lù bùfáng jiébàn tóngxíng.
|vo_01_01_tl         = "In the swaying wind and rain, return barefoot with a blade"... My name is Kaedehara Kazuha, a ronin who travels the world. Since you and I are both travelers, we might as well go together on this journey.

|vo_02_01_title_s    = 闲聊・自然
|vo_02_01_title_t    = 閒聊・自然
|vo_02_01_subtitle   = Chat: Nature
|vo_02_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Chat - Nature.ogg
|vo_02_01_tx_s       = 见到了这么美丽的景色，自然会产生云游四海的想法吧？
|vo_02_01_tx_t       = 見到了這麼美麗的景色，自然會產生雲遊四海的想法吧？
|vo_02_01_rm         = Jiàn dào le zhème měilì de jǐngsè, zìrán huì chǎnshēng yúnyóu sìhǎi de xiǎngfǎ ba?
|vo_02_01_tl         = Seeing such a beautiful scenery, one must surely have the urge to wander the world, right?

|vo_02_02_title_s    = 闲聊・吹奏
|vo_02_02_title_t    = 閒聊・吹奏
|vo_02_02_subtitle   = Chat: Playing a Tune
|vo_02_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Chat - Playing a Tune.ogg
|vo_02_02_tx_s       = 既然手边有树叶，我可以为你吹奏一曲。
|vo_02_02_tx_t       = 既然手邊有樹葉，我可以為(你/妳)吹奏一曲。
|vo_02_02_rm         = Jìrán shǒubiān yǒu shùyè, wǒ kěyǐ wèi nǐ chuīzòu yī qū.
|vo_02_02_tl         = Now that I have leaves at hand, I can play a song for you.

|vo_02_03_title_s    = 闲聊・剑技
|vo_02_03_title_t    = 閒聊・劍技
|vo_02_03_subtitle   = Chat: Bladework
|vo_02_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Chat - Bladework.ogg
|vo_02_03_tx_s       = 飘摇风雨中，睹物思故乡，这把刀…是我与故乡唯一的联系了。
|vo_02_03_tx_t       = 飄搖風雨中，睹物思故鄉，這把刀…是我與故鄉唯一的聯繫了。
|vo_02_03_rm         = Piāoyáo fēngyǔ zhōng, dǔ wù sī gùxiāng, zhè bǎ dāo... shì wǒ yǔ gùxiāng wéiyī de liánxì le.
|vo_02_03_tl         = In the swaying wind and rain, seeing things and thinking of my home, this blade... is the only connection I have with the land of my birth.

|vo_03_01_title_s    = 下雨的时候…
|vo_03_01_title_t    = 下雨的時候…
|vo_03_01_subtitle   = When It Rains
|vo_03_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} When It Rains.ogg
|vo_03_01_tx_s       = 在大雨中漫步，让人神志清醒。不过等雨停之后，还是尽快把衣服烤干比较好。
|vo_03_01_tx_t       = 在大雨中漫步，讓人神志清醒。不過等雨停之後，還是盡快把衣服烤乾比較好。
|vo_03_01_rm         = Zài dàyǔ zhōng mànbù, ràng rén shénzhì qīngxǐng. Bùguò děng yǔ tíng zhīhòu, háishì jǐnkuài bǎ yīfú kǎo gàn bǐjiào hǎo.
|vo_03_01_tl         = A walk in the heavy rain is refreshing. However, it is better to dry your clothes as soon as possible after the rain stops.

|vo_03_02_title_s    = 打雷的时候…
|vo_03_02_title_t    = 打雷的時候…
|vo_03_02_subtitle   = When Thunder Strikes
|vo_03_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} When Thunder Strikes.ogg
|vo_03_02_tx_s       = 比起在海上航行时遇到的雷暴，这倒也算不上什么。
|vo_03_02_tx_t       = 比起在海上航行時遇到的雷暴，這倒也算不上什麼。
|vo_03_02_rm         = Bǐqǐ zài hǎishàng hángxíng shí yùdào de léibào, zhè dào yě suàn bù shàng shénme.
|vo_03_02_tl         = This is nothing compared to the thunderstorms encountered out at sea.

|vo_03_03_title_s    = 下雪的时候…
|vo_03_03_title_t    = 下雪的時候…
|vo_03_03_subtitle   = When It Snows
|vo_03_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} When It Snows.ogg
|vo_03_03_tx_s       = 我喜欢下雪，雪后的世界很安静，无人来扰我清梦。
|vo_03_03_tx_t       = 我喜歡下雪，雪後的世界很安靜，無人來擾我清夢。
|vo_03_03_rm         = Wǒ xǐhuan xià xuě, xuě hòu de shìjiè hěn ānjìng, wú rén lái rǎo wǒ qīng mèng.
|vo_03_03_tl         = I like it when it snows, the world is very quiet after it snows, no one to disturb my dream.

|vo_03_04_title_s    = 阳光很好…
|vo_03_04_title_t    = 陽光很好…
|vo_03_04_subtitle   = When the Sun Is Out
|vo_03_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} When the Sun Is Out.ogg
|vo_03_04_tx_s       = 晴空万里，真让人心情愉快。
|vo_03_04_tx_t       = 晴空萬里，真讓人心情愉快。
|vo_03_04_rm         = Qíngkōng wànlǐ, zhēn ràng rén xīnqíng yúkuài.
|vo_03_04_tl         = The sky is clear, it makes me happy.

|vo_04_01_title_s    = 早上好…
|vo_04_01_title_t    = 早安…
|vo_04_01_subtitle   = Good Morning
|vo_04_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Morning.ogg
|vo_04_01_tx_s       = 清晨的鸟鸣，是大自然的馈赠。启程吧，属于我们的旅途也要开始了。
|vo_04_01_tx_t       = 清晨的鳥鳴，是大自然的餽贈。啟程吧，屬於我們的旅途也要開始了。
|vo_04_01_rm         = Qīngchén de niǎo míng, shì dàzìrán de kuìzèng. Qǐchéng ba, shǔyú wǒmen de lǚtú yě yào kāishǐle.
|vo_04_01_tl         = Birdsong in the morning is a gift from nature. Let's go, our journey is about to begin.

|vo_04_02_title_s    = 中午好…
|vo_04_02_title_t    = 午安…
|vo_04_02_subtitle   = Good Afternoon
|vo_04_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Afternoon.ogg
|vo_04_02_tx_s       = 正午的阳光，让人想要小睡片刻。找个地方休息一下如何？
|vo_04_02_tx_t       = 正午的陽光，讓人想要小睡片刻。找個地方休息一下如何？
|vo_04_02_rm         = Zhèngwǔ de yángguāng, ràng rén xiǎng yào xiǎoshuì piànkè. Zhǎo gè dìfāng xiūxi yīxià rúhé?
|vo_04_02_tl         = The midday sun makes people want to take a nap. How about finding a place to rest?

|vo_04_03_title_s    = 晚上好…
|vo_04_03_title_t    = 晚上好…
|vo_04_03_subtitle   = Good Evening
|vo_04_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Evening.ogg
|vo_04_03_tx_s       = 抬头见月，侧耳听风，壶中有酒，我心太平…<br />晚上好。
|vo_04_03_tx_t       = 抬頭見月，側耳聽風，壺中有酒，我心太平…<br />晚上好。
|vo_04_03_rm         = Tái tóu jiàn yuè, cè ěr tīng fēng, hú zhōng yǒu jiǔ, wǒ xīn tài píng...<br />Wǎnshang hǎo.
|vo_04_03_tl         = Looking up at the moon, listening to the wind, there is wine in the jug, my heart is peaceful...<br />Good evening.

|vo_04_04_title_s    = 晚安…
|vo_04_04_title_t    = 晚安…
|vo_04_04_subtitle   = Good Night
|vo_04_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Good Night.ogg
|vo_04_04_tx_s       = 风停了…<br />安静的世界，适合好好休息。明天见。
|vo_04_04_tx_t       = 風停了…<br />安靜的世界，適合好好休息。明天見。
|vo_04_04_rm         = Fēng tíngle...<br />ānjìng de shìjiè, shìhé hǎohǎo xiūxi. Míngtiān jiàn.
|vo_04_04_tl         = The wind has stopped...<br />A quiet world, suitable for a good rest. See you tomorrow.

|vo_05_01_title_s    = 关于枫原万叶自己・航行
|vo_05_01_title_t    = 關於楓原萬葉自己・航行
|vo_05_01_subtitle   = About {character}: Sailing
|vo_05_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About {character} - Sailing.ogg
|vo_05_01_tx_s       = 其实，大海并非每晚都充满风浪。天气清朗的时候，月光倒映在摇晃的海面上，鱼群在船舶的周围随行。我坐在船头眺望远方，会觉得这段旅程非常值得…唯一的遗憾是水手们的歌声太吵了，他们不用睡觉的吗？
|vo_05_01_tx_t       = 其實，大海並非每晚都充滿風浪。天氣清朗的時候，月光倒映在搖晃的海面上，魚群在船舶的周圍隨行。我坐在船頭眺望遠方，會覺得這段旅程非常值得…唯一的遺憾是水手們的歌聲太吵了，他們不用睡覺的嗎？
|vo_05_01_rm         = Qíshí, dàhǎi bìngfēi měi wǎn dōu chōngmǎn fēnglàng. Tiānqì qīnglǎng de shíhòu, yuèguāng dàoyìng zài yáohuàng de hǎimiàn shang, yú qún zài chuánbó de zhōuwéi suíxíng. Wǒ zuò zai chuán tóu tiàowàng yuǎnfāng, huì juéde zhè duàn lǚchéng fēicháng zhídé... Wéiyī de yíhàn shì shuǐshǒumen de gēshēng tài chǎole, tāmen bùyòng shuìjiào de ma?
|vo_05_01_tl         = In fact, the sea is not full of wind and waves every night. When the weather is clear, the moonlight reflects on the swaying sea, and schools of fish swim alongside the ship. I sit on the bow looking into the distance and think the journey was well worth it... The only downside was that the sailors were singing so loudly, don't they have to sleep?

|vo_05_02_title_s    = 关于枫原万叶自己・贵族武士
|vo_05_02_title_t    = 關於楓原萬葉自己・貴族武士
|vo_05_02_subtitle   = About {character}: Samurai Nobility
|vo_05_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} About {character} - Samurai Nobility.ogg
|vo_05_02_tx_s       = 枫原家曾经也是有名的武士门第，可惜传承到我这里时，除了贵族的名号外已经别无长物。不过对我来说倒也足够了，武士不需要富足的生活，我们需要的是诗歌、美酒与手中的刀。
|vo_05_02_tx_t       = 楓原家曾經也是有名的武士門第，可惜傳承到我這裡時，除了貴族的名號外已經別無長物。不過對我來說倒也足夠了，武士不需要富足的生活，我們需要的是詩歌、美酒與手中的刀。
|vo_05_02_rm         = Fēngyuán-jiā céngjīng yěshì yǒumíng de wǔshì méndì, kěxī chuánchéng dào wǒ zhèlǐ shí, chúle guìzú de mínghào wài yǐjīng bié wú cháng wù. Bùguò duì wǒ lái shuō dào yě zúgòule, wǔshì bù xūyào fùzú de shēnghuó, wǒmen xūyào de shì shīgē, měijiǔ yǔ shǒuzhōng de dāo.
|vo_05_02_tl         = The Kaedehara Clan used to be a famous samurai family, but unfortunately, when the name was passed down to me, the title itself was all that was left. But that's enough for me, samurai have no need for a lavish life, all we need is poetry, wine, and the blade in our hands.

|vo_05_03_title_s    = 想要了解枫原万叶・其一
|vo_05_03_title_t    = 想要了解楓原萬葉・其一
|vo_05_03_subtitle   = About {character}: I
|vo_05_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 01.ogg
|vo_05_03_tx_s       = 想要了解我的事？如你所见，我只是个随处可见的流浪武士。
|vo_05_03_tx_t       = 想要了解我的事？如(你/妳)所見，我只是個隨處可見的流浪武士。
|vo_05_03_rm         = Xiǎng yào liǎojiě wǒ de shì? Rú nǐ suǒ jiàn, wǒ zhǐshì ge suíchù kějiàn de liúlàng wǔshì.
|vo_05_03_tl         = Want to know more about me? As you can see, I am just a wandering samurai you could find just about anywhere.

|vo_05_04_title_s    = 想要了解枫原万叶・其二
|vo_05_04_title_t    = 想要了解楓原萬葉・其二
|vo_05_04_subtitle   = About {character}: II
|vo_05_04_friendship = 3
|vo_05_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 02.ogg
|vo_05_04_tx_s       = 我的耳朵很敏锐，能够听到各种各样的声音。比如风吹过山岗的声音，云散开的声音，林间的小狐狸啃咬苹果的声音，螃蟹吐泡泡的声音…这是自然万物对我的眷顾，让我总能提前发现危险的到来。
|vo_05_04_tx_t       = 我的耳朵很敏銳，能夠聽到各種各樣的聲音。比如風吹過山崗的聲音，雲散開的聲音，林間的小狐狸啃咬蘋果的聲音，螃蟹吐泡泡的聲音…這是自然萬物對我的眷顧，讓我總能提前發現危險的到來。
|vo_05_04_rm         = Wǒ de ěrduo hěn mǐnruì, nénggòu tīng dào gè zhǒng gè yàng de shēngyīn. Bǐrú fēng chuīguò shāngǎng de shēngyīn, yún sànkāi de shēngyīn, lín jiàn de xiǎo húlí kěn yǎo píngguǒ de shēngyīn, pángxiè tǔ pàopào de shēngyīn... zhè shì zìrán wànwù duì wǒ de juàngù, ràng wǒ zǒng néng tíqián fāxiàn wēixiǎn de dàolái.
|vo_05_04_tl         = My ears are very sharp and can hear a wide variety of sounds. For example, the sound of the wind blowing through the hills, the sound of the parting clouds, the sound of the foxes gnawing on apples in the forest, the sound of the crabs blowing bubbles... This is nature's gift to me, so that I can always detect danger in advance.

|vo_05_05_title_s    = 想要了解枫原万叶・其三
|vo_05_05_title_t    = 想要了解楓原萬葉・其三
|vo_05_05_subtitle   = About {character}: III
|vo_05_05_friendship = 4
|vo_05_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 03.ogg
|vo_05_05_tx_s       = 小时候我很喜欢下雨，那种沙沙的声响容易给人一个安稳的梦。但长大了以后，对雨的感情就变得复杂了许多…虽然依旧喜欢听雨，但每次看到乌云的时候，却又忍不住感叹「今天能不能找到好心人让我借宿呢」。穿着湿漉漉的衣服听雨，往往会被喷嚏声打断了情调。
|vo_05_05_tx_t       = 小時候我很喜歡下雨，那種沙沙的聲響容易給人一個安穩的夢。但長大了以後，對雨的感情就變得複雜了許多…雖然依舊喜歡聽雨，但每次看到烏雲的時候，卻又忍不住感嘆「今天能不能找到好心人讓我借宿呢」。穿著濕漉漉的衣服聽雨，往往會被噴嚏聲打斷了情調。
|vo_05_05_rm         = Xiǎoshíhòu wǒ hěn xǐhuān xià yǔ, nà zhǒng shāshā de shēngxiǎng róngyì gěi rén yīgè ānwěn de mèng. Dàn zhǎng dàle yǐhòu, duì yǔ de gǎnqíng jiù biàn de fùzále xǔduō... suīrán yījiù xǐhuān tīng yǔ, dàn měi cì kàn dào wūyún de shíhòu, què yòu rěn bù zhù gǎntàn "Jīntiān néng bùnéng zhǎodào hǎoxīn rén ràng wǒ jièsù ne". Chuānzhe shīlùlù de yīfu tīng yǔ, wǎngwǎng huì bèi pēntì shēng dǎ duànle qíngdiào.
|vo_05_05_tl         = When I was little, I liked the rain very much, and the rustling sound can easily lull people into a peaceful sleep. But since I've grown older, my feelings for the rain became a lot more complicated... Although I still like listening to the rain, every time I see dark clouds, I can't help but sigh, "Can I find a good person to let me sleep in today?" Listening to the rain in drenched clothes is often interrupted by the sound of sneezing.

|vo_05_06_title_s    = 想要了解枫原万叶・其四
|vo_05_06_title_t    = 想要了解楓原萬葉・其四
|vo_05_06_subtitle   = About {character}: IV
|vo_05_06_friendship = 5
|vo_05_06_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 04.ogg
|vo_05_06_tx_s       = 我不会在一个地方驻足太久。因为太久的停留会让我跟「自然」产生隔阂，也会让我手里的刀变钝。趁我还能远航，我希望自己能去各种各样的地方，见到不同的人们。
|vo_05_06_tx_t       = 我不會在一個地方駐足太久。因為太久的停留會讓我跟「自然」產生隔閡，也會讓我手裡的刀變鈍。趁我還能遠航，我希望自己能去各種各樣的地方，見到不同的人們。
|vo_05_06_rm         = Wǒ bù huì zài yīgè dìfāng zhùzú tài jiǔ. Yīnwèi tài jiǔ de tíngliú huì ràng wǒ gēn "zìrán" chǎnshēng géhé, yě huì ràng wǒ shǒu lǐ de dāo biàn dùn. Chèn wǒ hái néng yuǎnháng, wǒ xīwàng zìjǐ néng qù gè zhǒng gè yàng de dìfāng, jiàn dào bùtóng de rénmen.
|vo_05_06_tl         = I don't stay in one place for too long. Doing so will dull the connection between me and "nature", and the blade in my hand. While I am still able to sail far away, I hope I can go to all kinds of places and meet all sorts of different people.

|vo_05_07_title_s    = 想要了解枫原万叶・其五
|vo_05_07_title_t    = 想要了解楓原萬葉・其五
|vo_05_07_subtitle   = About {character}: V
|vo_05_07_friendship = 6
|vo_05_07_file       = VO_{language}{character} More About {character} - 05.ogg
|vo_05_07_tx_s       = 不必担心，就算有一天我们去往不同的地方，也一定会在世界的某处再次相遇。人与人的「缘」不是那么容易就断掉的东西。
|vo_05_07_tx_t       = 不必擔心，就算有一天我們去往不同的地方，也一定會在世界的某處再次相遇。人與人的「緣」不是那麼容易就斷掉的東西。
|vo_05_07_rm         = Bùbì dānxīn, jiùsuàn yǒu yītiān wǒmen qù wǎng bùtóng de dìfang, yě yīdìng huì zài shìjiè de mǒu chù zàicì xiāngyù. Rén yǔ rén de "yuán" bùshì nàme róngyì jiù duàn diào de dōngxi.
|vo_05_07_tl         = Don't worry, even if we part ways one day, we will meet again somewhere in the world. The "bond" between people is not something that can be easily broken.

|vo_06_01_title_s    = 关于我们・出海
|vo_06_01_title_t    = 關於我們・出海
|vo_06_01_subtitle   = About Us: Going Out to Sea
|vo_06_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Us - Going Out to Sea.ogg
|vo_06_01_tx_s       = 找个好天气，出海看看如何？
|vo_06_01_tx_t       = 找個好天氣，出海看看如何？
|vo_06_01_rm         = Zhǎo ge hǎo tiānqì, chūhǎi kànkan rúhé?
|vo_06_01_tl         = How about we go see how it is at sea when the weather's nice?

|vo_06_02_title_s    = 关于我们・畅谈
|vo_06_02_title_t    = 關於我們・暢談
|vo_06_02_subtitle   = About Us: Frank Speech
|vo_06_02_friendship = 6
|vo_06_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Us - Frank Speech.ogg
|vo_06_02_tx_s       = 我喜欢性格爽朗的人，这样相处时可以畅所欲言。有什么想说的不必藏在心里，我能够听到自然万物的声音，其中也包括你的声音。
|vo_06_02_tx_t       = 我喜歡性格爽朗的人，這樣相處時可以暢所欲言。有什麼想說的不必藏在心裡，我能夠聽到自然萬物的聲音，其中也包括(你/妳)的聲音。
|vo_06_02_rm         = Wǒ xǐhuan xìnggé shuǎnglǎng de rén, zhèyàng xiāngchǔ shí kěyǐ chàngsuǒyùyán. Yǒu shén me xiǎng shuō de bùbì cáng zai xīnlǐ, wǒ nénggòu tīng dào zìrán wànwù de shēngyīn, qízhōng yě bāokuò nǐ de shēngyīn.
|vo_06_02_tl         = I like people who are outgoing, so they can speak freely to one another. I don't have to hide what I want to say in my heart, I can hear the voice of all things in nature, including your voice.

|vo_07_01_title_s    = 关于「神之眼」…
|vo_07_01_title_t    = 關於「神之眼」…
|vo_07_01_subtitle   = About the [[Vision]]
|vo_07_01_friendship = 4
|vo_07_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About the Vision.ogg
|vo_07_01_tx_s       = 在我看来，神之眼是力量的「证明」，而不是力量的「来源」。神之眼象征的是凡人继续向前的愿望，而我们武士的底气，一直都是手里的刀。
|vo_07_01_tx_t       = 在我看來，神之眼是力量的「證明」，而不是力量的「來源」。神之眼象徵的是凡人繼續向前的願望，而我們武士的底氣，一直都是手裡的刀。
|vo_07_01_rm         = Zài wǒ kàn lái, Shénzhīyǎn shì lìliàng de "zhèngmíng", ér bùshì lìliàng de "láiyuán". Shénzhīyǎn xiàngzhēng de shì fánrén jìxù xiàngqián de yuànwàng, ér wǒmen wǔshì de dǐqì, yīzhí dōu shì shǒu lǐ de dāo.
|vo_07_01_tl         = As I see it, a Vision is a "proof" of power, not a "source" of power. It symbolizes the desire of mortals to move forward, and the strength of us samurai has always been the sword in our hands.

|vo_07_02_title_s    = 有什么想要分享・竹刀
|vo_07_02_title_t    = 有什麼想要分享・竹刀
|vo_07_02_subtitle   = Something to Share: Bamboo Blades
|vo_07_02_friendship = 4
|vo_07_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Something to Share - Bamboo Blades.ogg
|vo_07_02_tx_s       = 想学剑道的话…我想想，拿着这个吧，这是我刚刚做好的竹刀。用这个切磋的话，我们就都不会受伤了。
|vo_07_02_tx_t       = 想學劍道的話…我想想，拿著這個吧，這是我剛剛做好的竹刀。用這個切磋的話，我們就都不會受傷了。
|vo_07_02_rm         = Xiǎng xué jiàndào dehuà... wǒ xiǎng xiǎng, názhe zhège ba, zhè shì wǒ gānggāng zuò hǎo de zhúdāo. Yòng zhège qiēcuō dehuà, wǒmen jiù dōu bù huì shòushāngle.
|vo_07_02_tl         = If you want to learn the art of the sword... Let me think... Take this, this is a bamboo sword I just made. If we use these to train, we will not have to worry about getting hurt.

|vo_07_03_title_s    = 有什么想要分享・枫叶
|vo_07_03_title_t    = 有什麼想要分享・楓葉
|vo_07_03_subtitle   = Something to Share: Maple Leaves
|vo_07_03_friendship = 4
|vo_07_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Something to Share - Maple Leaves.ogg
|vo_07_03_tx_s       = 「深山踏红叶，耳畔闻鹿鸣」…我很喜欢枫叶，可惜枫叶红时总多离别。
|vo_07_03_tx_t       = 「深山踏紅葉，耳畔聞鹿鳴」…我很喜歡楓葉，可惜楓葉紅時總多離別。
|vo_07_03_rm         = "Shēnshān tà hóngyè, ěr pàn wén lù míng"... Wǒ hěn xǐhuān fēngyè, kěxī fēngyè hóng shí zǒng duō líbié.
|vo_07_03_tl         = "When you step on red leaves in the deep mountains, you can hear the deer chirping"... I like maple leaves very much, but it's a pity that when the maple leaves are red, I always have to say goodbye.

|vo_07_04_title_s    = 感兴趣的见闻…
|vo_07_04_title_t    = 感興趣的見聞…
|vo_07_04_subtitle   = Interesting Things
|vo_07_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Interesting Things.ogg
|vo_07_04_tx_s       = 海鸥别叫啦，从今天起，我也是漂泊者呀。
|vo_07_04_tx_t       = 海鷗別叫啦，從今天起，我也是漂泊者呀。
|vo_07_04_rm         = Hǎi'ōu bié jiào la, cóng jīntiān qǐ, wǒ yěshì piāobó zhě ya.
|vo_07_04_tl         = Seagulls, halt your cries, from today onwards, I am a wanderer once more.

|vo_08_01_title_s    = 关于北斗…
|vo_08_01_title_t    = 關於北斗…
|vo_08_01_subtitle   = About [[Beidou]]
|vo_08_01_friendship = 4
|vo_08_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Beidou.ogg
|vo_08_01_tx_s       = 北斗大姐头是我的恩人。大姐头她收留了从稻妻逃出来的我，并在我最困难的那段时期里，给了我重返稻妻的勇气。她是我和所有船员可以托付后背的战友。
|vo_08_01_tx_t       = 北斗大姐頭是我的恩人。大姐頭她收留了從稻妻逃出來的我，並在我最困難的那段時期裡，給了我重返稻妻的勇氣。她是我和所有船員都可以託付後背的戰友。
|vo_08_01_rm         = Běidǒu-dàjiětóu shì wǒ de ēnrén. Dàjiětóu tā shōuliúle cóng Dàoqī táo chūlái de wǒ, bìng zài wǒ zuì kùnnán de nà duàn shíqí lǐ, gěile wǒ chóng fǎn Dàoqī de yǒngqì. Tā shì wǒ hé suǒyǒu chuányuán kěyǐ tuōfù hòubèi de zhànyǒu.
|vo_08_01_tl         = Big Sister Beidou is my benefactor. She took me, who had just escaped from Inazuma, in, and gave me the courage to return in my most difficult of times. She is a comrade-in-arms that I and all the crew can trust.

|vo_08_02_title_s    = 关于五郎…
|vo_08_02_title_t    = 關於五郎…
|vo_08_02_subtitle   = About [[Gorou]]
|vo_08_02_friendship = 4
|vo_08_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Gorou.ogg
|vo_08_02_tx_s       = 我在被通缉的那段时间里，反抗军给了我许多帮助。那时候我与五郎只有短暂的接触，但我对他的印象很深刻。他是那种有话就说的直性子，与部下同甘共苦，为朋友两肋插刀，与我很合得来。
|vo_08_02_tx_t       = 我在被通緝的那段時間裡，反抗軍給了我許多幫助。那時候我與五郎只有短暫的接觸，但我對他的印像很深刻。他是那種有話就說的直性子，與部下同甘共苦，為朋友兩肋插刀，與我很合得來。
|vo_08_02_rm         = Wǒ zài bèi tōngjī de nà duàn shíjiān lǐ, fǎnkàng jūn gěile wǒ xǔduō bāngzhù. Nà shíhòu wǒ yǔ Wǔláng zhǐyǒu duǎnzàn de jiēchù, dàn wǒ duì tā de yìnxiàng hěn shēnkè. Tā shì nà zhǒng yǒu huà jiù shuō de zhíxìngzi, yǔ bùxià tónggāngòngkǔ, wèi péngyǒu liǎnglèichādāo, yǔ wǒ hěn hédelái.
|vo_08_02_tl         = During the time I was a wanted man, the resistance helped me a lot. I had only brief contact with Gorou at the time, but I was very impressed by him. He is the kind of straightforward person who speaks when he has something to say. He shares weal and woe with his subordinates, and never hesitates to draw his sword for the sake of his friends.

|vo_08_03_title_s    = 关于九条裟罗・态度…
|vo_08_03_title_t    = 關於九條裟羅・態度…
|vo_08_03_subtitle   = About [[Kujou Sara]]
|vo_08_03_friendship = 4
|vo_08_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Kujou Sara.ogg
|vo_08_03_tx_s       = 能在御前决斗中战胜我的朋友，我确实认可她的实力。但她却用这样的力量为虎作伥，带领九条军不断回收「神之眼」，我无法原谅。
|vo_08_03_tx_t       = 能在御前決鬥中戰勝我的朋友，我確實認可她的實力。但她卻用這樣的力量為虎作倀，帶領九條軍不斷回收「神之眼」，我無法原諒。
|vo_08_03_rm         = Néng zài yùqián juédòu zhōng zhànshèng wǒ de péngyou, wǒ quèshí rènkě tā de shílì. Dàn tā què yòng zhèyàng de lìliàng wèihǔzuòchāng, dàilǐng Jiǔtiáo jūn bùduàn huíshōu "Shénzhīyǎn", wǒ wúfǎ yuánliàng.
|vo_08_03_tl         = She defeated my friend in the duel before the throne, which I accept as proof of her great strength. But she used such power to act as an oppressor's lackey and led the Kujou Clan's troops to relentlessly seek out and confiscate Visions. This, I cannot forgive.

|vo_08_04_title_s    = 关于九条裟罗・改观…
|vo_08_04_title_t    = 關於九條裟羅・改觀…
|vo_08_04_subtitle   = About Kujou Sara: Changing Perspective
|vo_08_04_friendship = 4
|vo_08_04_quest      = Omnipresence Over Mortals
|vo_08_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Kujou Sara - Changing Perspective.ogg
|vo_08_04_tx_s       = 原来如此。看来她也有自己坚持的信念。只是不知道风波平息后，「九条」家还能否延续曾经的昌盛。
|vo_08_04_tx_t       = 原來如此。看來她也有自己堅持的信念。只是不知道風波平息後，「九條」家還能否延續曾經的昌盛。
|vo_08_04_rm         = Yuánlái rúcǐ. Kànlái tā yěyǒu zìjǐ jiānchí de xìnniàn. Zhǐshì bù zhīdào fēngbō píngxī hòu, "Jiǔtiáo"-jiā hái néng fǒu yánxù céngjīng de chāngshèng.
|vo_08_04_tl         = I see. It seems that she also has her own beliefs. It's just that I don't know if the Kujou Clan can continue its prosperity after this storm has passed.

|vo_08_05_title_s    = 关于雷电将军…
|vo_08_05_title_t    = 關於雷電將軍…
|vo_08_05_subtitle   = About the [[Raiden Shogun]]
|vo_08_05_friendship = 4
|vo_08_05_quest      = Autumn Winds, Scarlet Leaves
|vo_08_05_file       = VO_{language}{character} About the Raiden Shogun.ogg
|vo_08_05_tx_s       = 离开稻妻后，我许多次扪心自问，我对雷电将军的不满是否源于那一次御前决斗，是否源于她对友人落下的那一刀？<br />我想了很久，觉得不是的。我的友人是堂堂正正地死在了决斗场上，雷电将军的那一刀也并无不妥。我对她的不满，来源于「眼狩令」。没有任何人有资格剥夺他人的愿望，即便是「神」也不行。
|vo_08_05_tx_t       = 離開稻妻後，我許多次捫心自問，我對雷電將軍的不滿是否源於那一次御前決鬥，是否源於她對友人落下的那一刀？<br />我想了很久，覺得並非如此。我的友人是堂堂正正地死在決鬥場上，雷電將軍的那一刀也並無不妥。我對她的不滿來源於「眼狩令」。沒有任何人有資格剝奪他人的願望，即便是「神」也不行。
|vo_08_05_rm         = Líkāi Dàoqī hòu, wǒ xǔduō cì ménxīnzìwèn, wǒ duì Léidiàn Jiāngjūn de bùmǎn shìfǒu yuányú nà yīcì yùqián juédòu, shìfǒu yuányú tā duì yǒurén luòxià de nà yīdāo?<br />Wǒ xiǎngle hěnjiǔ, juéde bùshì de. Wǒ de yǒurén shì tángtángzhèngzhèng de sǐ zàile juédòu chǎng shang, Léidiàn Jiāngjūn de nà yīdāo yě bìng wú bùtuǒ. Wǒ duì tā de bùmǎn, láiyuányú "Yǎnshòu-lìng". Méiyǒu rènhé rén yǒu zīgé bōduó tārén de yuànwàng, jíbiàn shì "shén" yě bùxíng.
|vo_08_05_tl         = After I left Inazuma, I asked myself many times whether my dissatisfaction with the Raiden Shogun stemmed from her actions in the duel before the throne, or from the blade she drew on my dear friend?<br />I've thought about it for a long time, and I don't think so. My friend died an honorable death in that duel, and there is nothing unjustified with the Shogun's conduct. My dissatisfaction with her comes from the Vision Hunt Decree. No one has the right to take away the hopes and dreams of others, not even a god.

|vo_08_06_title_s    = 关于神里绫华…
|vo_08_06_title_t    = 關於神里綾華…
|vo_08_06_subtitle   = About [[Kamisato Ayaka]]
|vo_08_06_friendship = 4
|vo_08_06_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Kamisato Ayaka.ogg
|vo_08_06_tx_s       = 生活在稻妻的人，应该都听过「白鹭公主」这个名字吧。神里家的大小姐，近乎完美的一个人，不过我跟她没什么交集，不知道她对如今的稻妻抱有怎样的看法。
|vo_08_06_tx_t       = 生活在稻妻的人，應該都聽過「白鷺公主」這個名字吧。神里家的大小姐，近乎完美的一個人，不過我跟她沒什麼交集，不知道她對如今的稻妻抱有怎樣的看法。
|vo_08_06_rm         = Shēnghuó zài Dàoqī de rén, yīnggāi dōu tīngguò "Báilù Gōngzhǔ" zhège míngzì ba. Shénlǐ-jiā de dà xiǎojiě, jìnhū wánměi de yīgè rén, bùguò wǒ gēn tā méishénme jiāojí, bù zhīdào tā duì rújīn de Dàoqī bào yǒu zěnyàng de kànfǎ.
|vo_08_06_tl         = Anyone who lives in Inazuma should have heard the name "Shirasagi Himegimi". The lady of the Kamisato Clan is as perfect as a person can be, but I seldom cross paths with her, so I do not know her thoughts on the current state of Inazuma.

|vo_08_07_title_s    = 关于宵宫…
|vo_08_07_title_t    = 關於宵宮…
|vo_08_07_subtitle   = About [[Yoimiya]]
|vo_08_07_friendship = 4
|vo_08_07_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Yoimiya.ogg
|vo_08_07_tx_s       = 上次她托大姐头把烟火运到璃月，还是我亲自去卸的货。好沉！除了她以外，应该没人能造出这么大的烟火了吧。
|vo_08_07_tx_t       = 上次她託大姐頭把煙火運到璃月，還是我親自去卸貨的。很沉！除了她以外，應該沒人能造出這麼大的煙火了吧。
|vo_08_07_rm         = Shàng cì tā tuō dàjiětóu bǎ yānhuǒ yùn dào Líyuè, háishì wǒ qīnzì qù xiè de huò. Hǎo chén! Chúle tā yǐwài, yīnggāi méi rén néng zào chū zhème dà de yānhuǒ le ba.
|vo_08_07_tl         = The last time she asked Captain Beidou to transport her fireworks to Liyue, I personally unloaded the goods. They were so heavy! Only she could have created such huge fireworks.

|vo_08_08_title_s    = 关于珊瑚宫心海…
|vo_08_08_title_t    = 關於珊瑚宮心海…
|vo_08_08_subtitle   = About [[Sangonomiya Kokomi]]
|vo_08_08_friendship = 4
|vo_08_08_quest      = Omnipresence Over Mortals
|vo_08_08_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Sangonomiya Kokomi.ogg
|vo_08_08_tx_s       = 我在反抗军的时候，周围的同伴无不对珊瑚宫大人充满敬仰。她爱惜兵力，很少会做出不计死伤的打法，总是能够用最小的代价取得胜利。听说她还要统管海祇岛的政务和外交，真的忙得过来吗…
|vo_08_08_tx_t       = 我在反抗軍的時候，周圍的同伴無不對珊瑚宮大人充滿敬仰。她愛惜兵力，很少會做出不計死傷的打法，總是能夠用最小的代價取得勝利。聽說她還要統管海祇島的政務和外交，真的忙得過來嗎…
|vo_08_08_rm         = Wǒ zài fǎnkàng jūn de shíhou, zhōuwéi de tóngbàn wúbù duì Shānhúgōng dàren chōngmǎn jìngyǎng. Tā àixī bīnglì, hěnshǎo huì zuò chū bùjì sǐshāng de dǎ fǎ, zǒng shì nénggòu yòng zuìxiǎo de dàijià qǔdé shènglì. Tīngshuō tā háiyào tǒngguǎn Hǎiqí-dǎo de zhèngwù hé wàijiāo, zhēn de máng de guòlái ma...
|vo_08_08_tl         = During my time with the resistance, all my comrades around me were full of respect for Her Excellency. She cherishes her strength, limits casualties to a minimum, and is always able to win at the least cost. I heard that she also manages the government affairs and diplomacy of Watatsumi Island - isn't she really busy...

|vo_08_09_title_s    = 关于鹿野院平藏…
|vo_08_09_title_t    = 關於鹿野院平藏…
|vo_08_09_subtitle   = About [[Shikanoin Heizou]]
|vo_08_09_friendship = 4
|vo_08_09_file       = VO_{language}{character} About Shikanoin Heizou.ogg
|vo_08_09_tx_s       = 别看我这位侦探朋友平日里潇洒随性，一旦他办起案子来，那些原本围绕在他身旁活泼灵动的风，就聚成了凌厉锐气。确实让人钦佩。
|vo_08_09_tx_t       = 別看我這位偵探朋友平日裡瀟灑隨性，一旦他辦起案子來，那些原本圍繞在他身旁活潑靈動的風，就聚成了凌厲銳氣。確實讓人欽佩。
|vo_08_09_rm         = Bié kàn wǒ zhè wèi zhēntàn péngyou píngrìlǐ xiāosǎ suíxìng, yīdàn tā bàn qǐ ànzi lái, nàxiē yuánběn wéirào zai tā shēnpáng huópō língdòng de fēng, jiù jù chéngle línglì ruìqì. Quèshí ràng rén qīnpèi.
|vo_08_09_tl         = Although my detective friend is usually natural and unrestrained, once he starts a case, the lively wind that originally surrounded him will gather into a sharp spirit. It's really admirable.

|vo_10_01_title_s    = 枫原万叶的爱好…
|vo_10_01_title_t    = 楓原萬葉的愛好…
|vo_10_01_subtitle   = {character}'s Hobbies
|vo_10_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Hobbies.ogg
|vo_10_01_tx_s       = 躺在被正午的阳光晒暖的岩石上休息，醒来后继续漫无目的地前行。只要与刀相伴，我可以去任何地方。
|vo_10_01_tx_t       = 躺在被正午的陽光曬暖的岩石上休息，醒來後繼續漫無目的地前行。只要與刀相伴，我可以去任何地方。
|vo_10_01_rm         = Tǎng zài bèi zhèngwǔ de yángguāng shài nuǎn de yánshí shang xiūxí, xǐng lái hòu jìxù mànwúmùdì de qián xíng. Zhǐyào yǔ dāo xiāngbàn, wǒ kěyǐ qù rènhé dìfāng.
|vo_10_01_tl         = Lying on the rocks warmed by the midday sun, waking up and walking around aimlessly. I can go anywhere as long as I have my blade by my side.

|vo_10_02_title_s    = 枫原万叶的烦恼…
|vo_10_02_title_t    = 楓原萬葉的煩惱…
|vo_10_02_subtitle   = {character}'s Troubles
|vo_10_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Troubles.ogg
|vo_10_02_tx_s       = 每逢风暴降临的时候，「自然」的声音就会变得嘈杂，我的耳朵也会嗡嗡作响。如果是在晚上的话，往往会辗转许久都无法入眠，让人有些头痛。
|vo_10_02_tx_t       = 每逢風暴降臨的時候，「自然」的聲音就會變得嘈雜，我的耳朵也會嗡嗡作響。如果是在晚上的話，往往會輾轉許久都無法入眠，讓人有些頭痛。
|vo_10_02_rm         = Měi féng fēngbào jiànglín de shíhou, "zìrán" de shēngyīn jiù huì biàn de cáozá, wǒ de ěrduo yě huì wēng wēng zuò xiǎng. Rúguǒ shì zài wǎnshàng dehuà, wǎngwǎng huì zhǎnzhuǎn xǔjiǔ dōu wúfǎ rùmián, ràng rén yǒuxiē tóutòng.
|vo_10_02_tl         = Every time a storm comes, the sounds of nature get noisy and my ears buzz. If this happens at night, it is often impossible to fall asleep after tossing and turning for a long time, which is quite the headache.

|vo_10_03_title_s    = 喜欢的食物…
|vo_10_03_title_t    = 喜歡的食物…
|vo_10_03_subtitle   = Favorite Food
|vo_10_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Favorite Food.ogg
|vo_10_03_tx_s       = 在大海上航行时，最容易获取到的食材便是鱼肉。怎么样把鱼做得好吃，是每个在海上冒险的人都要思考的问题。有机会的话，也想让你尝尝看我的手艺。
|vo_10_03_tx_t       = 在大海上航行時，最容易取得的食材便是魚肉。怎麼樣把魚做得好吃，是每個在海上冒險的人都要思考的問題。有機會的話，也想讓(你/妳)嚐嚐看我的手藝。
|vo_10_03_rm         = Zài dàhǎi shang hángxíng shí, zuì róngyì huòqǔ dào de shícái biàn shì yúròu. Zěnme yàng bǎ yú zuò de hào chī, shì měi gè zài hǎishang màoxiǎn de rén dōu yào sīkǎo de wèntí. Yǒu jīhuì dehuà, yě xiǎng ràng nǐ chángchang kàn wǒ de shǒuyì.
|vo_10_03_tl         = When sailing on the sea, the easiest food to get is fish. How to make fish delicious is a question that everyone who ventures at sea has to think about. If you have a chance, I would you to try a taste of my craft.

|vo_10_04_title_s    = 讨厌的食物…
|vo_10_04_title_t    = 討厭的食物…
|vo_10_04_subtitle   = Least Favorite Food
|vo_10_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Least Favorite Food.ogg
|vo_10_04_tx_s       = 我呢，不是特别喜欢那些粗制的食物。在我看来，就算是一条普普通通的鱼也要烧得好吃才行，吃东西本应是让人身心愉快的事情，怎么能将就呢？
|vo_10_04_tx_t       = 我呢，不是特別喜歡那些粗製的食物。在我看來，就算是一條普普通通的魚也要燒得好吃才行，吃本應是讓人身心愉快的事情，怎麼能將就呢？
|vo_10_04_rm         = Wǒ ne, bùshì tèbié xǐhuan nàxiē cūzhì de shíwù. Zài wǒ kàn lái, jiùsuàn shì yītiáo pǔ pǔtōng tōng de yú yě yào shāo dé hào chī cái xíng, chī dōngxī běn yìng shì ràng rén shēnxīn yúkuài de shìqíng, zěnme néng jiāng jiù ne?
|vo_10_04_tl         = As for me, I'm not a big fan of crude food. In my opinion, even an ordinary fish needs to be cooked deliciously. Eating should be a pleasant thing for both body and mind, so how can it be done so haphazardly?

<!-- Receiving a Gift -->
|vo_11_01_title_s    = 收到赠礼・其一
|vo_11_01_title_t    = 收到贈禮・其一
|vo_11_01_subtitle   = Receiving a Gift: I
|vo_11_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Receiving a Gift - 01.ogg
|vo_11_01_tx_s       = 能将鱼肉烹调出如此滋味，你的手艺当真了得。
|vo_11_01_tx_t       = 能將魚肉烹調出如此滋味，（你/妳）的手藝當真了得。
|vo_11_01_rm         = Néng jiāng yúròu péngtiáo chū rúcǐ zīwèi, nǐ de shǒu yì dàngzhēn liǎodé.
|vo_11_01_tl         = That you can make fish taste as delicious as this is proof of your outstanding culinary prowess.

|vo_11_02_title_s    = 收到赠礼・其二
|vo_11_02_title_t    = 收到贈禮・其二
|vo_11_02_subtitle   = Receiving a Gift: II
|vo_11_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Receiving a Gift - 02.ogg
|vo_11_02_tx_s       = 你做的饭菜不仅能够饱腹，对我而言也是慰藉。
|vo_11_02_tx_t       = （你/妳）做的飯菜不僅能夠飽腹，對我而言也是慰藉。
|vo_11_02_rm         = Nǐ zuò de fàncài bùjǐn nénggòu bǎo fù, duì wǒ ér yán yě shì wèijiè.
|vo_11_02_tl         = The food you cook not only fills my stomach, but also comforts me.

|vo_11_03_title_s    = 收到赠礼・其三
|vo_11_03_title_t    = 收到贈禮・其三
|vo_11_03_subtitle   = Receiving a Gift: III
|vo_11_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Receiving a Gift - 03.ogg
|vo_11_03_tx_s       = 要休息一下吗？内心疲惫的话，做出来的菜也会失去风味。
|vo_11_03_tx_t       = 要休息一下嗎？內心疲憊的話，做出來的菜也會失去風味。
|vo_11_03_rm         = Yào xiūxi yīxià ma? Nèixīn píbèi dehuà, zuò chūlái de cài yěhuì shīqù fēngwèi.
|vo_11_03_tl         = Do you want to have a rest? If you've got a weary mind, the cooked dishes will lose their flavor.

|vo_12_01_title_s    = 生日…
|vo_12_01_title_t    = 生日…
|vo_12_01_subtitle   = Birthday
|vo_12_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Birthday.ogg
|vo_12_01_tx_s       = 哈…得知今天的生日，我特地写了新的诗歌。只可惜诗才不佳，几个晚上只想到前两句，就先送给你吧。<br />「流光换日月，鹤归云起庆生时」…欸等等，先别说话，我有灵感了。最后一句…「异乡有故知」，如何？<br />生日快乐，今天一起去…吃点甜品吧。
|vo_12_01_tx_t       = 哈…得知今天的生日，我特地寫了新的詩歌。只可惜詩才不佳，幾個晚上只想到前兩句，就先送給(你/妳)吧。<br />「流光換日月，鶴歸雲起慶生時」…等等，先別說話，我有靈感了。最後一句…「異鄉有故知」，如何？<br />生日快樂，今天一起去…吃點甜品吧。
|vo_12_01_rm_s       = Hā... dé zhī jīntiān de shēngrì, wǒ tèdì xiěle xīn de shīgē. Zhǐ kěxī shī cái bù jiā, jǐ gè wǎnshàng zhǐ xiǎngdao qián liǎng jù, jiù xiān sòng gěi nǐ ba.<br />"Liúguāng huàn rì yuè, hè guī yún qǐ qìngshēng shí"... Āi děng děng, xiān bié shuōhuà, wǒ yǒu línggǎnle. Zuìhòu yījù... "yìxiāng yǒu gùzhī", rúhé?<br />Shēngrì kuàilè, jīntiān yīqǐ qù... chī diǎn tiánpǐn ba.
|vo_12_01_rm_t       = <!-- Unsure of romanization, but traditional goes 等等，先別說話 instead of 欸等等，先别说话 -->
|vo_12_01_tl         = Ha... Knowing today is your birthday, I wrote a poem for you. It's a pity that it isn't the best. After trying for several evenings, I could only come up with the first two lines, so I will give them to you first.<br />"When the light changes the sun and the moon, when the crane returns to the cloud to celebrate his birthday"... Oh wait, don't talk, the last line is coming to me. The last sentence... "There is an old knowledge in a foreign land," how about it?<br />Happy birthday, today... let's go have some dessert.

|vo_13_01_title_s    = 突破的感受・起
|vo_13_01_title_t    = 突破的感受・起
|vo_13_01_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Intro
|vo_13_01_ascension  = 1
|vo_13_01_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension -  01.ogg
|vo_13_01_tx_s       = 这把刀，更加锋利了。
|vo_13_01_tx_t       = 這把刀，更加鋒利了。
|vo_13_01_rm         = Zhè bǎ dāo, gèngjiā fēnglìle.
|vo_13_01_tl         = My blade grows sharper.

|vo_13_02_title_s    = 突破的感受・承
|vo_13_02_title_t    = 突破的感受・承
|vo_13_02_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Building Up
|vo_13_02_ascension  = 2
|vo_13_02_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension -  02.ogg
|vo_13_02_tx_s       = 雪落在地上的声音，细不可闻…但现在的我，应该可以听到了。
|vo_13_02_tx_t       = 雪落在地上的聲音，細不可聞…但現在的我，應該可以聽到了。
|vo_13_02_rm         = Xuě luò zài dìshang de shēngyīn, xì bùkě wén... dàn xiànzài de wǒ, yīnggāi kěyǐ tīng dàole.
|vo_13_02_tl         = The sound of snow falling to the ground is quite the inaudible thing... but now that my senses are sharper, I should be able to hear it.

|vo_13_03_title_s    = 突破的感受・转
|vo_13_03_title_t    = 突破的感受・轉
|vo_13_03_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Climax
|vo_13_03_ascension  = 4
|vo_13_03_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension -  03.ogg
|vo_13_03_tx_s       = 海上的风浪很大，我也要变得更强。
|vo_13_03_tx_t       = 海上的風浪很大，我也要變得更強。
|vo_13_03_rm         = Hǎishàng de fēnglàng hěn dà, wǒ yě yào biàn de gèng qiáng.
|vo_13_03_tl         = The waves rise high out at sea, and I, too, must become stronger.

|vo_13_04_title_s    = 突破的感受・合
|vo_13_04_title_t    = 突破的感受・合
|vo_13_04_subtitle   = Feelings About Ascension: Conclusion
|vo_13_04_ascension  = 6
|vo_13_04_file       = VO_{language}{character} Feelings About Ascension -  04.ogg
|vo_13_04_tx_s       = 行走世间，自然会有各种烦恼相伴，但既得与你相遇，不管是武艺还是内心都有了新的成长。想必今后的人生也会更加自在吧。
|vo_13_04_tx_t       = 行走世間，自然會有各種煩惱相伴，但既得與(你/妳)相遇，不管是武藝還是內心都有了新的成長。想必今後的人生也會更加自在吧。
|vo_13_04_rm         = Xíngzǒu shìjiān, zìrán huì yǒu gè zhǒng fánnǎo xiāngbàn, dàn jìdé yǔ nǐ xiāngyù, bùguǎn shì wǔyì háishì nèixīn dōu yǒule xīn de chéngzhǎng. Xiǎngbì jīnhòu de rénshēng yě huì gèngjiā zìzài ba.
|vo_13_04_tl         = Wandering the world will naturally come with all kinds of troubles, but now that I have met you, there will be new growth in both my martial arts and my heart. I am confident that I can be more at ease in life from this point forth.
}}
